response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet your highest expectations. This extraordinary item is not just a product; it's an investment in excellence, innovation, and unparalleled quality. Given its immense value to you, we propose a special offer of $1,200,000 for this remarkable piece. We believe this price reflects the true worth of the product while allowing you to secure it at a premium compared to its intrinsic value. Should you choose to accept this offer, we promise a seamless transaction and exceptional customer service to ensure your complete satisfaction. If you have any questions or need further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. Looking forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 1200000}
